code:
graph TD
    subgraph Knowledge_Base
        D[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        C[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        D --> |1a. Chunk & Process| C
    end

    DB[Groupware_IssueTracker]
    Knowledge_Base -->|1b. Generate Embeddings| DB

    Q[Groupware_IssueTracker]
    E[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
    Q -->|2a. Generate_Embedding| E
    E -->|2b. Vector Similarity Search| DB

    CTX[Groupware_ChatRoom]
    DB -->|3 Retrieve Relevant Chunks| CTX
    
    P[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
    Q -->|"4a. Combine"| P
    CTX -->|"4b. Combine"| P
    
    LLM[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
    R[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
    P -->|5 Send to LLM| LLM
    LLM -->|6 Generate Response| R
